articles.description: Former captain will continue to play T20Is, having represented South Africa in 154 ODIs and a solitary Test
articles.content: NewsFormer captain will continue to play T20Is, having represented South Africa in 154 ODIs and a solitary Test

articles.author: Cricketnext Staff
articles.title: 'For How Long Will You Stick With Him': Aakash Chopra Urges LSG to Drop 'Out of Form' Batter for DC Clash - News18
articles.description: Former India opener Aakash Chopra feels the batter’s poor run is forcing the other in-form players to face lesser deliveries
articles.content: Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) are on a winning spree in the ongoing Indian Premier League (IPL) 2022. While the big guns like Mumbai Indians and Chennai Super Kings are yet to open their accounts in the… [+1635 chars]
